revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Celeno |model=VXT1300 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/04/2009 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,bridge |fcc_id=XQOMWB-1305 |ic_id=5248U-MWB1305 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Celeno |cpu1_model=CL1300 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Celeno |wi1_chip1_model=CL1300 |wi1_chip2_brand=Maxim |wi1_chip2_model=MAX2828 |wi1_chip3_brand=Maxim |wi1_chip3_model=MAX2828 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=an |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=10.0.0.2 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0B:8C |oui_eth=00:0B:8C }} *The [[Celeno]] logo, "Patent Pending Celeno Proprietary", "CELENO VXT1300 AP", and "P/N BOARD: PCB00020" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*Per the FCC test report, the device "utilizes 4 internal printed antennas: two transmit and two receive".
The FCC manual states the default IP is 10.0.0.2.
